short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows a user to bookmark and return to a job on the new jobs ireland website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows a user to bookmark and return to a job on the new jobs ireland website. It works by injecting a small non-intrusive script that updates the URL on any job page to contain the job id. On return visits via bookmarks it will use this ID to get the job details.
